name: Mind Over Matter (bencinstudios)
description:
Mind Over Matter is the product of a 2-day Game Jam hosted by the Nashville Game Developers and The Adventure Science Center in September 2018.  It's a 2D puzzle platformer where your goal is to guide the water through the laboratory-like puzzle by utilizing the various phases of water - solid, liquid, gas - to navigate obstacles.  All the while our water molecule friend, Mo L. Cool, will provide educational blurbs about the science of water! 

Please note that this is a prototype game.
